title: New: Foreign Air – Echo
body:
Perfect weekend pop music here from US duo **Foreign Air** – laced with one of the catchiest hooks you’ll hear this year.

Having already cracked the viral charts on Spotify, alongside playing alongside the likes of X Ambassadors and Lewis Del Mar, the only way is up for Foreign Air. Check out _Echo_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
